utils.calculate_resistance_r0¶

utils.calculate_resistance_r0(bias_v: float | ndarray, current_a: float | ndarray) → float | ndarray¶

Calculates the resistance in units of the resistance quantum \(R_{0} = 12900\;\mathrm{Ohm}\)

Parameters:
bias_vfloat or numpy.array

measured bias in V

current_afloat or numpy.array

measured current in A

Returns:
resfloat or numpy.array

resistance in ::math::R_{0} units

MCBJ STM-BJ
